lead_paragraph: Even as he chastised Washington’s political class for a lack of backbone, Mr. Trump showed modest signs that some of his remarks crossed a line.

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Advice to Panicked Republicans: Man Up
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Advice to Panicked Republicans: Man Up

snippet: Even as he chastised Washington’s political class for a lack of backbone, Mr. Trump showed modest signs that some of his remarks crossed a line.
abstract: Carl Hulse On Washington column warns those who think Donald Trump will adopt more cautious approach in general election will be disappointed; notes that while Trump seems to understand that racially charged comments about judge overseeing lawsuit against Trump University were over line, he has essentially told Republicans critical of comments to 'man up'.
